questions.question_text: The default expiration method for non-feed indicators is either to never expire or to expire after a specific period of time. How frequently does XSOAR check tor newly expired indicators?

discussion.content:
should be D based on franko_72
As of today the exam version is about 6.6 version.

D
Indicator Expiration
Indicators can have the Expiration Status field set to Active or Expired, which is determined by the Expiration field. When indicators expire, they still exist in Cortex XSOAR, meaning they are still displayed and you can still search for them. A job that runs every hour checks for newly expired indicators and updates the Expiration Status field.
https://docs-cortex.paloaltonetworks.com/r/Cortex-XSOAR/6.5/Cortex-XSOAR-Administrator-Guide/Disable-Indicator-Extraction-for-Automations-or-Integrations

A job that runs weekly checks for newly expired indicators and updates the Expiration Status field. So it's weekly? This is for version 6.10
Version 6.6 - A job that runs every hour checks for newly expired indicators and updates the Expiration Status field.

Selected Answer: D
Jobs: These are scheduled tasks or processes that can be managed via remote repositories. This allows for version control and synchronization across different environments.

questions.question_text: Which content type can be managed using remote repositories?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
The correct answer is A. reputation-script.

When configuring an indicator type in Cortex XSOAR, the tag reputation-script is mandatory for an Indicator reputation script. This tag is used to identify the script that calculates the reputation of an indicator.

Selected Answer: D
Reputation scripts must have the reputation tag applied to appear in the list.

questions.question_text: Which tag is mandatory for an Indicator reputation Script while configuring an indicator type?
When is the post-processing script executed in XSOAR?

choices.C: After the post processing task is executed

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: CD
I have generated the test in my xsoar, the correct answer is C and D

Selected Answer: CD
I think it's probably a CD

choices.B: Get csvList.value where csvList.value equals test {}[from previous tasks]
choices.C: Get csvList.value where csvList.value equals test [from previous tasks]
choices.A: Get csvList.value where csvList.value equals test [as value]
choices.D: Get csvList.value where csvList.value equals ${test} [as value]
